channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Physical Rescue; INC#0471; 09:20AM; 11300 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N3AV5L; #LakeViewTerrace; Firefighters successfully freed the trapped victim. Five total patients were assessed by LAFD Paramedics on scene. Three will not be transported by LAFD. The other two are being taken to a local hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. LAPD Inc #1180. Nothing further.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E77 E98 EM15 FR91 HR3 RA74 RA898 RA91 RA98 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0471; 08:49AM; 11300 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N3AV5L; #LakeViewTerrace; PRELIM: Traffic collision between an SUV and a box truck, with 4 people involved. One person is trapped. Firefighters are setting up an extrication operation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E77 E98 EM15 FR91 HR3 RA898 RA91 RA98 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1550; 11:55PM; WB 134 Fwy, east of Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46shVVr; #Pasadena; The location of the wreck was just outside of the LA City boundary, east of Eagle Rock. Pasadena FD is the lead agency, and LAFD assisted in extricating both patients from the overturned big rig. Both patients were transported (one by LAFD ambulance). Nothing further.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E42 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 RA55 T12; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1550; 11:08PM; WB 134 Fwy x Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46shVVr; #EagleRock; Overturned big rig with two victims trapped inside. Firefighters are setting up extrication measures on both sides of the big rig to help the two people trapped inside.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E42 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 RA55 T12; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1533; 11:10PM; 4950 W 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sTbwER; #MidCity; Firefighters found an outside fire extending into a building used as a daycare. Crews made access and extended hose lines inside, while others ascended ladders to the roof and ventilated the steep-pitched roof from roof ladders (with hooks that grab onto the ridge of the roof). It took 30 firefighters 15 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E261 E294 E61 E68 E94 RA68 RA861 T61 T94; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1533; 10:55PM; 4950 W 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sTbwER; #MidCity; One-story building, operating as a daycare, with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E261 E294 E61 E68 E94 RA68 RA861 T61 T94; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0985; 03:29PM; 5916 E York Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUhBci; #HighlandPark; Firefighters arrived to find flames consuming a small (12' x 20') structure in front of a single-family home. It took 18 firefighters just 9 minutes (3:38pm) to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E12 E212 E250 E47 E55 RA12 RA850 T12 T50; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0869; 02:31PM; 17639 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SR5QWC; #Northridge; Crews responded to a home on fire (which had both one-story and two-story portions) at the end of a cul-de-sac. Firefighters made access and extinguished the flames in the living space, and then worked their way up to the fire in the attic. Ultimately, it took 45 firefighters 20 minutes to completely extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E103 E273 E287 E290 E70 E73 E87 EM15 RA70 RA87 T73 T87 T90; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0869; 02:11PM; 17639 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SR5QWC; #Northridge; One-story home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E103 E273 E287 E70 E87 RA70 RA87 T73 T87; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Greater Alarm Fire; INC#1521; 10:05PM; 901 E New Dock St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZwG6m; #SanPedro; 68 LAFD Firefighters took just 46 minutes in defensive firefighting operations to extinguish heavy fire in a 100' x 100' open roofed metal-clad industrial building at "SA Recycling Terminal Island" ( https://www.sarecycling.com/yard/sa-recycling-terminal-island ) a metal recycling firm on Terminal Island, at least 200 yards from the waterline at the Port of Los Angeles. The burning materials appear to be metal scrap and other debris, apparently related to automobile recycling. No injury. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 BT17 BT2 BT3 CM20 CM22 E112 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E40 E49 EM13 RA112 RA36 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey
